name: Unity3d flurry
tagline: Unity3d Flurry Analytics Plugin for iOS and Android
body:
unity3d_flurry ============== Description: Flurry Analytics Plugin for Unity3D
Author: Faizan Naqvi
Company: Nerdiacs
Website: http://www.Nerdiacs.com Licence: The code is free to use under LGPL licencing which means you can use it in commercial applications. http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.txt Usage 1- Put everything from Plugins directory into Plugins directory of your project.
2- Create object of NerdFlurry and use the API. For more information on api checkout https://dev.flurry.com/ Sample
For usage check sample GUI script NerdFlurryUI.cs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
